dict.acceptation: 炎热的；炽热的；沸腾的；激昂的；
煮沸，沸腾；一次烹煮量；<俚>一群，全体；

sent.orig: The low-boiling inflammable part and the high-boiling residue both had to be discarded as useless.
sent.trans: 低沸点易燃部分和高沸点之残渣油均须弃置用。

sent.orig: The application of low pressure boiling technique could increase wort boiling temperature to 100.
sent.trans: 采用低压煮沸工艺，可提高煮沸麦汁温度至100。

sent.orig: Check the boiling disc. Exchange the boiling disc before install if it is damp.
sent.trans: 查看沸腾板受潮没有，如沸腾板受潮请更换后再进行安装，否则影响使用效果。

sent.orig: The boiling heat transfer of nitrogen in the narrow channels differs from that in pool boiling.
sent.trans: 窄缝通道中的液氮沸腾传热特性有别于开放空间中的情况。

sent.orig: Start boiling water for pasta, go answer the doorbell and-whoosh-all thoughts of boiling water disappear.
sent.trans: 烧开水，为做意大利面条而开始烧开水，走开去应答门铃-然后，呜的一下-所有烧水有关的念想统统消失了。
